name: Escape (itch) (Ilias Woithe)
description:
How To Play

Move: Arrow or AWSD keys
Toggle light: Ctrl or Z
Restart level: R

You wake up and find yourself inside a dungeon. You must find your way out. Use the light to guide you.

Look out for ghosts. Ghosts are only visible when the light is turned off. Each time you are hit by a ghost, you will loose a life. You have three lives.

Credits

Created for the Godot Wild Jam #52.
Theme: Ghosts
Wildcard: Guiding Light - Find your way in the dark

Code and art created by me
Background music: "Ghost Waltz" by SoulProdMusic
Font: Kenney Mini Square
SFX:
"Coin 2" by soundnimja
"double door lock" by DesignDean
